articles.author: Joe Prince-Wright
articles.title: Bournemouth hire Andoni Iraola after shock Gary O’Neil firing - NBC Sports
articles.description: Bournemouth have caused a huge shock as they fired manager Gary O'Neil and replaced him with Spanish coach Andoni Iraola.
articles.content:
Manchester United transfer news is always intriguing, and itll be doubly so this summer as manager Erik ten Hag prepares for his second season at Old Trafford.
